mapper.select: select nvl(sum(packqty), 0) from pack_case where status <>9 and ((fromtype = 1 and type = 0) or (fromtype = 2 and type = 0)) and storerkey='H360016'
select nvl(sum(packqty),0) from pack_case where status <>9 and (fromtype = 4 and type = 1) and storerkey='H360016'

select sum(nvl(qty,0)) from (select sum(packqty) qty from pack_case where status <>9 and ((fromtype = 1 and type = 1) or (fromtype = 4 and type = 2) or (fromtype = 2 and type = 1)) and storerkey='H360016')
select sum(nvl(qty,0)) from (select sum(packqty) qty from pack_case where status <>9 and storerkey='H360020' and ((fromtype = 1 and type = 0) or (fromtype = 2 and type = 0)))
